function.name: Nset
function.block: { RNumCalcValue n; n.d = (double)v; n.n = v; return n; }

function.name: Nsetf
function.block: { RNumCalcValue n; n.d = v; n.n = (ut64)v; return n; }

function.name: Naddi
function.block: { n.d += (double)v; n.n += v; return n; }

function.name: Nsubi
function.block: { n.d -= (double)v; n.n -= v; return n; }

function.name: Nneg
function.block: { n.n = ~n.n; return n; }

function.name: Norr
function.block: { n.d = v.d; n.n |= v.n; return n; }

function.name: Nxor
function.block: { n.d = v.d; n.n ^= v.n; return n; }

function.name: Nand
function.block: { n.d = v.d; n.n &= v.n; return n; }

function.name: Nadd
function.block: { n.d += v.d; n.n += v.n; return n; }

function.name: Nsub
function.block: { n.d -= v.d; n.n -= v.n; return n; }

function.name: Nmul
Nshl
function.block: { n.d += v.d; n.n <<= v.n; return n; }

function.name: Nshr
function.block: { n.d += v.d; n.n >>= v.n; return n; }

function.name: Nrol
Nror
Nmod
Ndiv
